Projects.name: Opensoft 2k22
Projects.info: In team of 20 people I worked in Frontend part and built applications using React and Material UI for a Food Ordering Application for both the Users and Restaurants. Also designed it in Figma. Currently website is not functional as backend servers are down.

Skills.name: web dev
Skills.skill: Knows HTML, CSS, SASS, JSX, React JS, Figma & Material UI.
